name: Baggy Cargo
description: MOST FAVORITE HOLY GRAIL, 8pockets, premium durable quality, khaki color, all over pinterest, grab this while you can.
flaw: 1 missing zipper puller, will have replaced before shipping!

name: Baggy Camo Cargo
description: HOLY GRAIL, 9pockets, premium quality, garterized waist + adjustable tie inside, definitely a must have, WORTH IT AF.

name: Parachute Cargo
description: A crowd’s favorite, holy grail!, very adjustable waist, extremely baggy, all over pinterest, a rare piece, good quality, WORTH IT.

name: Graphic Baggy Jeans
description: Crowd’s favorite, the overall graphics front & back with studs are the coolest!, a rare piece, minimal distressing, high quality denim, WORTH IT AF.
flaw: Small dot stain at front right thigh + stain at back left thigh part unnoticeable ww! also slightly distressed at back leg opening part!

name: Carpenter Overalls
description: Can also fit smaller waists, has the cutest heart adjustments, sharp hq denim, all over pinterest!, def worth it.
flaw: Rust at the right adjustment part

name: Baggy Jeans
description: Saurrr pretty & fits like a glove, good quality denim, a staple piece u need, in pristine condition, will keep if unsold.
flaw: Stain on the inside waistband unnoticeable ww!
